headline: Salesforce Q4: Expect Growth Slowdown To Stabilize In FY2026 (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Salesforce's FY2026 outlook suggests the growth slowdown may stabilize, but likely remain in the high single digits. Read why I upgrade CRM stock to Buy.
